title: By downloading Kaspersky net anti virus my phone I.e. pixel2 appears to have a blue filter display
content: By downloading Kaspersky net antivirus, the display appears to have a blue filter coating and the proper colours don't appear on the screen. After expiry of subscription of antivirus, the same problem still exists. After one year of purchase the type c port can't properly connect devises such as charger and head phone. Please suggest me any remedy
